The units in this folder are taken from external libraries or copied from
units distributed along with FPC/Lazarus:

* exctrls --> from ExCtrls (https://sourceforge.net/p/lazarus-ccr/svn/HEAD/tree/components/exctrls/)
  License: modified LGPL2 with linking exception, like LCL

* mphexeditor --> from https://github.com/michalgw/mphexeditor
  License: freeware (https://github.com/michalgw/mphexeditor/blob/master/hexeditor.html)
  
* mrumanager --> distributed along with Lazarus, but not installed by default
  License: modified LGPL with linking exception, like LCL
  
* OMultiPanel --> from http://www.kluug.net/omultipanel.php
  License: MPL 1.1/GPL 3/LGPL 3 tri-license. 
  
* real48utils --> contained in FPC installation (package rtl-extra)
  License: modified LGPL with linking exception,like RTL/FCL
